Text: Forget Nuendo an Cubase. This is very easy to use! recommended!

I wouldn't compare this to Nuendo - not even close. Tracktion IS very easy to use, but is not intended for the types of advanced production that Nuendo is designed for. Totally different class of product.
This release is missing all the plugins/examples/presets and documentation files..
This is a brilliant program! I have stopped using my Sonar 6.0 PE after i got this.
